name: Escape from the Idol Dungeon
description:
Free the Korean pop idols from the k-pop idol dungeon in this short and kind of stupid game by Kpopalypse.

Warning: A few adult concepts and rude words here and there, but nothing all that extreme.  This isn't "Melty's Quest" (unfortunately).

This game is completely FREE, however if you actually enjoyed this garbage please consider supporting Kpopalypse on Patreon so I can make even more of this trash, thank you.

For context or to leave comments visit www.kpopalypse.com

Please enjoy!

Patch note: v1.01 fixes a bug where you could walk through Lizzy on level 1.
